pr_title: Fix #197: Provided  Dockerfile is always skipped in simple Dockerfile mode

timeline.author: manusa

replies.author: manusa

timeline.message: Fix #197: Provided  Dockerfile is always skipped in simple Dockerfile mode

Send Dockerfile's parent directory as zip archive in case of no Docker contextDir being provided

+ Updated DockerAssemblyManager to handle no contextDir case
+ Added Simple Dockerfile sample
